label: At the Annual Meeting of the International Council of Beit Hatfutzot Honorary Fellowship of Beit Hatfutzot have been presented to Mr. Itzhak Navon, Prof. Salo Baron, Mr, Isaac Bashevis Singer, Mr, Norman Gilmovsky and to Mr. Abraham Spiegel.
